Posts.Content: Sep 27, 2018 06:32PM SunnyInSummer wrote: BC2018, I had redness & swelling the first week. The doctors said the same - that this isn’t normal; however, a nurse told me this happens more than one thinks. So, I ordered Miaderm with lidocaine from Amazon. Expensive, but the pain, swelling, and redness reduced extensively. I hope you find relief. I could not imagine going through this without Miaderm. It really saved my sanity. Wishing you well.
Posts.Title: Nipple Pain and Swelling Loisp54 SunnyInSummer
